statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions;
SELECT contribution_id, contributor_name FROM campaign_contributions;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_date FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM campaign_contributions GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000;
SELECT contribution_id, contributor_name, contribution_amount, MONTH(contribution_date) AS contribution_month FROM campaign_contributions WHERE YEAR(contribution_date) = 2022;
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contributor_name LIKE 'A%' AND contribution_amount < 500 ORDER BY contribution_date ASC;
SELECT contributor_name, AVG(contribution_amount) AS average_contribution FROM campaign_contributions GROUP BY contributor_name ORDER BY average_contribution DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT recipient_name, category FROM expenditures WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contributor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT recipient_name, category, amount FROM expenditures ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM expenditures
SELECT contributor_name, amount AS donation_amount FROM contributions
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT contributor_id, amount, date FROM contributions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM expenditures
SELECT recipient, amount FROM expenditures WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%'
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT contributor_id, amount, date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM contributions INNER JOIN campaigns ON contributions.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id
SELECT recipient, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenditures GROUP BY recipient HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT donor_name, contribution_type, amount FROM contributions WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%' AND contribution_type = 'individual';
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE amount >= 5000 ORDER BY expenditure_date ASC;
SELECT recipient, purpose, amount FROM expenditures WHERE purpose IS NOT NULL ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM contributions WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' AND donation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT recipient, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenditures GROUP BY recipient HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, email FROM donors WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY donor_name;
SELECT recipient_name, office FROM recipients WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democrat' ORDER BY office;
SELECT * FROM contributors;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM contributors;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, candidate_id FROM campaigns ORDER BY candidate_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, expenditure_amount FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';

SELECT c.campaign_name, SUM(co.contribution_amount) as total_contributions FROM campaigns c JOIN contribution_logs cl ON c.campaign_id = cl.campaign_id JOIN contributors co ON co.contributor_id = cl.contributor_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name ORDER BY total_contributions DESC;
